TopicTitle: Bon Voyage and Word Stabilizer Updates?

Articles.Content: Are versions of Bon Voyage and World Stabilizer updated for KSP 1.6 in the works? The 1.5.whatever versions still work on load, but when I last tried to use BV my rover ended up so banged up it couldn't sit still.

Mine just launched (in pieces) straight into space when I loaded it on the Mun. With or without World Stabilizer.

But I have SVT, I shall investigate if that's the cause, I know it makes the ground even more groundy.
